projects.title: Modern Learning Content Management System Website
projects.description: A dynamic platform for educators to manage courses, quizzes, and student progress with modern UI/UX, built using React and Node.js for seamless content delivery.

projects.title: Private AI Chatbot For Health Insurance Queries
projects.description: An AI-driven chatbot for handling health insurance inquiries securely, integrated with natural language processing for personalized responses and data privacy compliance.

projects.title: Premium Collection Websites
projects.description: Elegant websites for curating and showcasing premium product collections, featuring responsive designs, e-commerce integration, and subscription models.

projects.title: Luxe Studio Website
projects.description: A sophisticated website for a luxury studio, highlighting services with high-end visuals, booking systems, and parallax scrolling for an immersive experience.

projects.title: Charity Donation Website
projects.description: A user-friendly platform for charitable donations, with secure payment gateways, impact tracking, and storytelling elements to engage donors.

projects.title: Travel Booking Website
projects.description: An intuitive travel booking site with search filters, real-time availability, and map integrations for seamless trip planning and reservations.

projects.title: AI Bidding Document Checker Tool
projects.description: An AI tool to automate bidding document reviews, ensuring compliance, extracting key data, and generating reports for efficient procurement processes.

projects.title: AI Bot Binance Futures Trading
projects.description: An intelligent trading bot for Binance futures, using AI algorithms for market analysis, automated trades, and risk management to optimize profits.

projects.title: Loyalty Mobile App
projects.description: A mobile app for customer loyalty programs, featuring points tracking, rewards redemption, and push notifications using React Native for cross-platform compatibility.

projects.title: AI Video Generation Specialist
projects.description: A specialized tool for AI-powered video generation, allowing users to create custom videos from text prompts with advanced editing and export features.
